basic_info.name: Krishna Chaitanya Institute of Technology and Sciences Facilities

Section.name: About KITS
Section.description:
Krishna Chaitanya Institute of Technology and Sciences (KITS) was established in 2004 by Sri Anna Venkata Rambabu, the MLA of Giddalur Assembly Constituency in Prakasam. It is located at Devarajugattu, Markapur in Andhra Pradesh. It is running under Sri Anna Subba Rangaiah, Smt. Dhana Lakshmamma Chariatable Trust. KITS has five under graduate courses. It also offers post graduate engineering and management courses.
